#FDNYNYPDGame | @NorthwellHealth https://t.co/eR1I7lfie8

More on how the FDNY vs NYPD Game supports those who have lost a family member in the line of duty.

FDNY vs NYPD at @UBSArena. 

💻: https://t.co/kGnOtXzr7F
⏰: 6:30PM ceremony, 7PM puck drop https://t.co/fJTgplTiGC

"It was just completely unexpected and it was just an amazing feeling obviously to have that support from the fans."
https://t.co/3vv5rVOxIY

"We're obviously disappointed that we didn't make the playoffs. But now we will have time to reset and get ready for next season."

Varlamov ⬇️ https://t.co/BjBabvf7E1

"Each year is about learning. It was about rounding out my game and getting better each and every game."

Johnston ⬇️ https://t.co/Z4D1KhtsGf

"The building is incredible. The fans were great all the way through it. Last night was amazing to be a part of. The amount of respect they showed Chara. We're disappointed we didn't give them the season they were hoping for."

Martin ⬇️ https://t.co/3ZIMZJ52YH

"Everyone believes in this core and this group."

Beauvillier ⬇️ https://t.co/QwW1Shk1VK

"I'm doing well. I am at 100% going into offseason training. It stinks to miss those games, but I will be good."

Mayfield ⬇️ https://t.co/zAfsa87Lyq

"We've got one of the best rooms I have ever been a part of. There's so much I can learn from them."

Wahlstrom ⬇️ https://t.co/KYhBvoYD3e

"Andy has been such a great guy off and on the ice. I enjoy spending a lot of time with. I can not say enough good things about him. He's done so much for my development in my career."

More from Dobson ⬇️ https://t.co/6kks9AHD35

“We’re good friends. We have a really good relationship. He helps me so much.”

Sorokin on his relationship with Varlamov and more ⬇️ https://t.co/FUlO49aKGR

"Our locker room is not happy with how the season went. We want to be competing for the Stanley Cup every year. This group is already excited to get back." 

Barzal ⬇️ https://t.co/Iihl0Jk77m

"Find a way to get yourself prepared for the next season and start on the right foot."

Palmieri ⬇️ https://t.co/R0dOEQ3FHO

"I've been here a long time. I believe in the direction, I believe in the guys we've got and I really think we're going to get this done. I wanted to make sure that I was here to see that through."

More from Clutterbuck ⬇️ https://t.co/RtQBZ52tOx

"He's got that confidence and he's feeling good about his game. You can see it building. He's just a heck of a player, great guy and just very happy for him this year."

Greene on Dobson ⬇️ https://t.co/zv5x8nyBTv

"Having both of them (Chara & Greene) back there. It's great for myself and some of the younger guys to learn from. They are constant pros."

More from Pelech ⬇️ https://t.co/Q6yABO8s0q

“We want to be out there and play those games. You take that frustration and make it motivation.”

Pageau ⬇️ https://t.co/vKSMjVuVSj

"The support we got at @UBSArena all season long was incredible." 

More from Bailey ⬇️ https://t.co/2eXk1JtX87

“@UBSArena is great, beautiful arena. Everything is top notch. The fans were great and I thought the atmosphere was great. It was a cool mixture of a brand new facility with a little bit of an old rink feel.”

More from Brock ⬇️ https://t.co/B8sAHk64JR

“The belief is there. Our core is one that has been together a long time. We’ve been through a lot together. We’ve been through good runs, bad runs. We’ve grown up together in a lot of ways. The belief hasn't changed. It’s about getting back to what makes us successful.”

Lee ⬇️ https://t.co/wlB5lWo3zy
Thank you, #IslesNation. https://t.co/OEjTs5JyGt
Tonight's 3 Takeaways.

"It was completely unexpected and an amazing feeling. To have that support from the fans that =they were giving us all season long. I was getting chills. I will cherish that for the rest of my life. Very classy." 

Chara on tonight ⬇️ https://t.co/Osj8OcqiX2

“That just tells me how much respect this player has garnered around this league, the player that has played against him. It speaks volumes of what he has accomplished as a human in this game."

Trotz on Chara ⬇️ https://t.co/VYYZQ5tnLa

"It was great. It was a special moment. Says a lot about Chara. Everything he has done in his career, all the work he has put in. he's one of the great leaders this game has seen. It was a really special moment."

Tonight we look back on the moment when Pat LaFontaine netted a game winning goal in quadruple OT as we celebrate iconic moments in #Isles history!

Tonight's @Ford Military Hero of the Game is U.S. Army Sergeant, William Marzuk!

William was drafted into the U.S. Army in 1968 & after 6 months of infantry training was shipped out to Vietnam, serving mostly in Pleiku along Highway 19.
